description:
This emergency blanket fits into a shirt or pants pocket. It could be carried as a shelter component of the “survival essentials” that Search and Rescue organizations recommend you carry, even on dayhikes. The metallized polyester film blocks wind and water, and reflects heat back to the body.

  • Aluminized non-stretch polyester film
  • Stays flexible in freezing temperatures
  • Unfolded size of 135 x 210cm
name: Coghlan's Emergency Blanket
